Title: Authorizes the alteration of school district boundaries
Summary: Authorizes the alteration of two or more school district boundaries by consent; provides that such alteration may be initiated by a petition in writing filed with the trustee, trustees or board of education of each school district; requires a joint feasibility study and joint public hearing on such alteration.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the alteration of school district boundaries; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
